replies.author: NoName德里奇
replies.txt_content:
点击这里就会自动下载：https://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.8.9-11.15.1.2318-1.8.9/forge-1.8.9-11.15.1.2318-1.8.9-installer-win.exe
请点击我的回复右下角“选为最佳答案”，谢谢！

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
http://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/index_1.8.9.html
点击recommended一栏中的installer,就会开始下载
